name: lru-weak-cache
description: A caching Map<string, V extends object> that deletes the least-recently-used items with weak references and async generation. Inspired by [lru-cache](https://www.npmjs.com/package/lru-cache).

scripts.test-coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --bail --reporter spec --check-leaks --require=source-map-support/register test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks --require=source-map-support/register test/

author: NexusTools <contact@nexustools.com>
